name: Daya Ranamukhaarachchi
description: Our CEO, Daya, was inspired to create the Taiga Tower from years of growing his own home garden in Baltimore.  When he moved to San Francisco he no longer had a space for a large family garden, which inspired him to create the Taiga Tower.

name: Soral Ranamukhaarachchi
description: Soral is Daya's son and is a senior majoring in Neuroscience at UCSD.

name: Ken Miyachi
description: Ken is a senior at UCSD and majors in Computer Science.  He is interested in creating products that enhance living.
